text: Pokrovka () is a rural locality (a village) in Starokalkashevsky Selsoviet, Sterlibashevsky District, Bashkortostan, Russia. The population was 20 as of 2010. There is 1 street. == Geography == It is located 20 km from Sterlibashevo, 5 km from Stary Kalkash. == References == Category:Rural localities in Sterlibashevsky District
title: Pokrovka, Sterlibashevsky District, Republic of Bashkortostan
